project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Create a simple contact book that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts, storing them in a JSON file and interacting with users via the terminal.

task.name: Implement function to add a contact
Implement function to search for a contact
Implement function to update a contact
Implement function to delete a contact
Implement JSON file storage for contacts
Create a user interface for terminal interaction
Write tests for each of the functions above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
